messages.content: What is the purpose of the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node?
The purpose of the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node is to load PNG images sequentially along with their metadata.
What image format does the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node support?
The comfyui-load-image-in-seq node only supports PNG images that have been generated by ComfyUI.
What are some of the features of the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node?
Some features of the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node include reading metadata, loading images sequentially, showing a preview when the index is changed, and allowing quick inpainting on the preview.
How can you change the index in the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node?
You can change the index in the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node by using the arrow keys.
What was added in version 1.0.3 of the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node?
In version 1.0.3 of the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node, support for images generated with the Model DB node was added.
What happens when you change the dir_path in version 1.0.4 of the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node?
In version 1.0.4 of the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node, when you change the dir_path, all images in that directory are loaded.
What are some of the references for the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node?
Some references for the comfyui-load-image-in-seq node include the was-node-suite-comfyui and the comfyui-prompt-reader-node.
